name: M8T Mecha Anime
description: Late-1990s anime cel animation style prompts for bipedal mobile suits, military pilots, and wartime scenarios inspired by realistic mecha anime aesthetics

dual_character_intro: A young man with tousled reddish-brown hair, wearing a green military pilot uniform and headset, turns his head with a startled expression. Behind him, a woman with long light blonde hair in a similar headset gazes intently

A stern-faced young man with long blonde hair tied back by a dark headband glares intently. Partially obscured behind him, a young woman with short reddish-brown hair peeks out with wide surprised eyes
A young man with short blonde hair and a focused expression wears a headset. Beside him, another young man with tousled red hair smirks confidently
A young man with tousled reddish-brown hair holds a radio handset to his ear. Behind him, a woman with long blonde hair tied back wears a bulky headset
